Key Match Events: Andrej Kramaric headed in a 70th-minute winner as Croatia fought back from a goal down to claim a 2-1 victory over visitors Scotland in the Nations League.
Ryan Christie opened the scoring in the 32nd minute for Scotland.
Igor Matanovic scored his first international goal in the 36th minute to equalize for Croatia.
Scotland thought they had nabbed a late equaliser in the 95th minute, but Che Adams' goal was ruled out for offside after a VAR review.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Croatia are second in League A Group 1 with six points, level with leaders Portugal.
Scotland remain bottom with no points after three defeats.
The match was held at Maksimir Stadium in Zagreb, Croatia, with an attendance of 21,702.
